parameters.name: KeyWord
parameters.description: The keyword that you want to use to search for the application.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to return.

Valid values: 1 to 200. Default value: 30.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that marks the position from which you want to start the query. If you leave this parameter empty, the query starts from the beginning.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The abbreviation of the Alibaba Cloud service name.

parameters.name: QuotaCategory
parameters.description:
The quota type. Valid values:

*   CommonQuota: general quota
*   FlowControl: API rate limit
*   WhiteListLabel: whitelist quota

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The approval state of the quota increase application. Valid values:

*   Disagree: The application is rejected.
*   Agree: The application is approved.
*   Process: The application is in review.
*   Cancel: The application is canceled.
